content: this is a tutorial on how to make this easy little crochet heart it works up really fast once you get a hang of it my best is 11 minutes but i m sure you can beat me you can use it as an applique decoration or as a cute addition to a valentine s day gift buy ad-free printable pdf here or find **free written pattern** on my blog there is a video tutorial a written pattern and a diagram the heart measures 5 cm ~2″ with the recommended yarn and hook
